raw: * This class provides a the base class for all clients that use the
* transport implementations in this namespace. Since the static method
* `registerTransport` cannot be inherited by subclasses, they mus proxy it

@description.name: @description
@description.body: This class provides a the base class for all clients that use the transport implementations in this namespace. Since the static method registerTransport cannot be inherited by subclasses, they mus proxy it by adding registerTransport : qx.io.transport.AbstractClient.registerTransport to their statics section.

raw: * Register a transport class for use with uris that match the given
* regular expression. The client will use the transport which first
* matches, starting with the last added transport
*    A regular expression which the URI must match
*    The qooxdoo class implementing the transport

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Register a transport class for use with uris that match the given regular expression. The client will use the transport which first matches, starting with the last added transport

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
{RegExp} uriRegExp
    A regular expression which the URI must match
@param.description: A regular expression which the URI must match

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
{qx.io.transport.ITransport}  transportClass
    The qooxdoo class implementing the transport
@param.description: The qooxdoo class implementing the transport

raw: * Given a transport object implementing {@link qx.io.transport.ITransport}
* select that transport; if a string URI is passed, select one that has
* been registered for that class of URIs.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Given a transport object implementing {@link qx.io.transport.ITransport} select that transport; if a string URI is passed, select one that has been registered for that class of URIs.
